wikipedia_page.main: Sir William Sydney Albert Atkins  (6 February 1902 – 15 August 1989) was the founder of Atkins, one of the United Kingdom's largest engineering consultancies.

response: * Sir William Sydney Atkins CBE, founder of WS Atkins, one of Britain's largest civil engineering companies
* William Sydney Atkins (1902–1989), founder of Atkins, engineering consultants
